h2_title: How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector
content: Secondly, you can expect The Supreme Inspector to fly up into the air quite often, where it will continue to attack you but be unreachable. When it's up in the air, it will largely use projectiles. These are typically in groups and need to be dodged to avoid them. You can throw the Plantain Fan out when it's airborne to immediately bring it back down and leave it vulnerable to attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Supreme_Celestial_Inspector.md', within the main section titled 'Supreme Celestial Inspector', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
Secondly, you can expect The Supreme Inspector to fly up into the air quite often, where it will continue to attack you but be unreachable. When it's up in the air, it will largely use projectiles. These are typically in groups and need to be dodged to avoid them. You can throw the Plantain Fan out when it's airborne to immediately bring it back down and leave it vulnerable to attacks.
